author: Haaretz Feb
title: More than 100 headstones reportedly vandalized at St. Louis Jewish cemetery - U.S. News - Haaretz.com
text: Opinion No, Donald Trump is not an anti-Semite. Accusing him of being one dangerously misses the point More than 100 headstones were damaged at a Jewish cemetery near St. Louis, Missouri, Fox News reported late on Monday . Police were unwilling to say whether they considered the damage done at the Chesed Shel Emeth Cemetery a hate crime, but were investigating the incident, according to the report. skip - Fox tweet. â€” Fox News (@FoxNews) February 20, 2017 The incident comes after at least 10 Jewish community centers across the country were targeted with bomb threats on Monday. According to local news reports, centers in New York, Wisconsin, Minnesota, New Mexico,Texas and Alabama were targeted on Monday, the fourth such mass disruption in less than two months. Anti-Defamation League head Jonathan Greenblatt called the incident "another revolting manifestation of anti-Semitism on the same day when we're dealing with bomb threats." He added, "Long overdue for our leaders to lead."
